text:
C'est ben le fun à Montréal depuis quelques années, avec toutes les pizzas 'fancy' que les restaurants plus récents font, mais des fois t'as le goût d'une bonne pizza pepperoni fromage qu'on mange depuis 40-50 ans. 

Et bien, dans le centre de Montréal, y'a pas mieux que Pendeli's. Service rapide, pas trop cher, le meilleur goût des pizzas graisseuses. C'est aussi simple que ça. 

Les Pendeli's qu'il y a à quelques endroits sont tous bons, donc s'il y en a un autre qui est plus proche de chez vous, vous ne pouvez pas vous tromper. Exemple, celui à Ville Saint-Laurent est aussi bon.
Meilleure vraie pizza en ville. Huileuse. Très bien garnie. Pas une pizza dégarnie comme chez Domino. Pas chère. Service rapide en commande téléphonique.

The first sign of trouble was the dirty store front but given the reputation, i decided to push forward. Major turn off was that the man who made the pie HANDLED THE MONEY without gloves. Regardless,  I tried to put that out of my head. So now for the review of the pie: a pepperoni pizza is no doubt the way to go. The generous toppings are quite tasty. Very dough-y though,  which is not my thing. If you are interested in home style pizza,  you are better off going to Van Horne Pizza a few doors down. Cleaner,  nicer folks,  more variety and tastier!

I miss this place. I grew up living in the same building as them, and we got lots of pizza from there. 

I think their pizza is probably what I based my whole appreciation of pizza around. As a kid I'd always go for the cheese pizza, I didn't like the extras. As a kid sometimes I'd eat the whole cheese part off and then enjoy the crust and sauce. They got it just perfect. I actually haven't had a pizza since that would make me enjoy the crust without the toppings like Pendelis. 

I was frustrated when Pendelis moved across the road and subway took over their old location. I tried to support them from time to time but it's just a tough location with then 3 pizza shops within a block. 

Love you guys at Pendelis especially the Greek guy who ran everything!
